articles.title: Chennai Super Kings: Undercooked, underwhelming, undone | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: CSK finished the 2022 season with just four wins - their worst-ever tally in the tournament
articles.content:
The extent of the poor campaign captured in the management's call to put Dhoni back in charge - the kind of mid-season change that you'd never associate with CSK ©BCCI 
This year was meant to be the… [+5056 chars]

articles.author: Annesha Ghosh
articles.title: Dhoni fan Kiran Navgire hopes to be a big hit in the Women's T20 Challenge - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The leading run scorer in the domestic T20s is excited about her first outing in the big leagues
articles.content: Not all brawn: "For the longest time, my approach was to score in sixes and fours. I didn't have the confidence to take ones and twos. But over time, I worked on rotating the strike"  •  Kiran Navgire

articles.title: Bangladesh vs Sri Lanka, 2nd Test, Sri Lanka tour of Bangladesh, 2022 - Cricbuzz

articles.content: 38.4 Taijul Islam to Kusal Mendis, no run, good length on the stumps, Kusal Mendis defends off the back foot
